title: Let's Talk Art: Discussing the Elements and Principles of Design through the Work of Two Artists
description:
Scroll down for links mentioned in this episode.
Sherie Harkins, an artist from Rhode Island, joins Karen Wong for a discussion of both the thought process and the working process of creating art in the hopes that we might draw other artists in the Jordan Peterson universe into a larger discussion of how we approach finding meaning in our work.

Sherie's website: https://www.sherieharkins.com
Karen's website: https://karenwongart.com/Image.asp?ImageID=1907555&apid=1&gpid=1&ipid=1&AKey=45XCHM8A
Sherie's conversation with Paul VanderKlay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A4Q_gZYQcqs&t=3589s
Karen's interview with Mary Kochan on the Elements and Principles:
https://youtu.be/rdjfxPnHqZs
Karen's conversations with Paul VanderKlay:
First (this is where he gave me the idea to start The Meaning Code) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HlMgGkwWUNY
Second: (This is where I tell the story of my life)
https://youtu.be/ZC03aNsPHOQ
Karen's talk with the Geologist from Illinois about Stochastic Resonance:
https://youtu.be/YttxOqlLLaQ (This was the first Meaning Code Episode)
Art and Fear by Orland and Bayles - highly recommend this book!
